getopt.h
========

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`UTILS <utils.md>`__

**Description:**

Provides functions and data structures, such as command-line argument
parsing.

You can use the functions provided in this file to perform operations
related to wide character types during development, such as,
command-line argument parsing.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------
